name: Harvest or Die (fiascosoftworks)
description:
Slimaggedon has hit your farm. Your only choice is to harvest your crops to trap the slimes. 

Goal: Make and harvest all one color fruit. 

Harvest wisely, you can store one color fruit (bottom right) by using spacebar to pick either fruit or bushes. Anyone can fall into holes after harvesting fruit so be careful! 

Use WASD to change direction and arrows to move, slimes move/spawn as you move. Good luck little jackalope!
